name: Target Practice (itch) (JPM01)
description:
This was the first game I ever tried to make in C++.

Uploading it here after discovering itch.io 

The Game

  • Shoot as many targets as you can before your health runs out! 
  • Collect ammo crates before you run out of bullets! 
  • The more targets you hit the faster they come!

What's your highest score?
